string.name: name
string.value: Building a Time Machine 5: Why's the Processing Plant so Far?
#b#p9250126##k is looking for someone to deliver all the Time Machine materials to the Processing Plant.
Use the OS4 Shuttle to deliver the materials for the Time Machine to the Processing Plant.\r\n\r\nWhen the shuttle arrives at the Processing Plant, enter the Processing Plant and come back out.
You delivered the materials for the Time Machine to the Processing Plant.
Great. Now, the materials for the Time Machine must be delivered to the Processing Plant. We'll need to use the OS4 Shuttle, since the materials are quite heavy.
Take the OS4 Shuttle in the Hangar and deliver the materials. You won't be able to leave the OS4 Shuttle during the delivery.
There's a chance you'll be attacked... But the shuttle has an attack function, so use it if you need to!
Don't know how to drive or something?
Good, you delivered the materials... You were driving like a madman! I'm just glad you didn't flip over!
They built the Processing Plant sooo far away. It's a huge hassle. \r\nMaybe it was the only place they could afford or something.
All the material collected doesn't mean a thing if it's not delivered to the processing plant...
